titleStmt.title: Tyranny of the Dutch against the English wherein is exactly declared the (almost unvaluable) loss which the commonwealth of England hath sustained by their usurpation : and likewise the sufferings and losses of Abraham Woofe, then factor at Lantore, and others in the island of Banda / formerly collected in loose sheets by Mr. Woofe himself ; and now illustrated and extracted out of his papers by John Quarles.
titleStmt.author: Woofe, Abraham.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Crowch, and Tho. Wilson ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
